trans-unit.source: Defines the serialization context for WS-Trust messages.
trans-unit.target: 定义 Ws-trust 消息的序列化上下文。

trans-unit.source: A container for objects used to serialize WS-Trust requests (RST) and responses (RSTR).
trans-unit.target: 用于序列化 Ws-trust 请求 (RST) 和响应 (RSTR) 的对象的容器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"></xref>使用指定的类<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager"></xref> object that contains the set of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler"></xref> objects to use for serializing and validating tokens found in WS-Trust messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager"> </xref>对象，其中包含的一套<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler"> </xref> Ws-trust 消息中找到对象用于序列化和验证令牌。

trans-unit.source: securityTokenHandlerCollectionManager is .
trans-unit.target: securityTokenHandlerCollectionManageris .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref>, and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"></xref>使用指定的类<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager"> </xref>， <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"> </xref>，和<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager"></xref> object that contains the set of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler"></xref> objects to use for serializing and validating tokens found in WS-Trust messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager"> </xref>对象，其中包含的一套<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler"> </xref> Ws-trust 消息中找到对象用于序列化和验证令牌。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> object to use to resolve security token references found in most elements of WS-Trust messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"> </xref>对象用于解析在 Ws-trust 消息的大多数元素中找到的安全令牌引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> object to use to resolve security token references found in the wst:UseKey element of RST messages as well as the wst:RenewTarget element found in RST messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"> </xref>对象用于解析在 RST 消息的 wst︰ 元素，以及在 RST 消息中找到的 wst: renewtarget 元素中找到的令牌引用的安全。

trans-unit.source: securityTokenHandlerCollectionManager is .
trans-unit.target: securityTokenHandlerCollectionManageris .

trans-unit.source: -or- securityTokenResolver is .
trans-unit.target: -or- securityTokenResolver is .

trans-unit.source: -or- useKeyTokenResolver is .
trans-unit.target: -or- useKeyTokenResolver is .

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager"></xref> that contains the set of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler"></xref> objects used for serializing and validating tokens found in WS-Trust messages.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager"></xref>包含的一套<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler"> </xref> Ws-trust 消息中找到用于序列化和验证令牌的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler"></xref> objects used to serialize and validate security tokens found in WS-Trust messages.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的集合<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler"> </xref> Ws-trust 消息中找到用于序列化和验证安全令牌的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> object used to resolve security token references found in most elements of WS-Trust messages.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref>对象用于解析在 Ws-trust 消息的大多数元素中找到的安全令牌引用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> object used to resolve security token references found in the wst:UseKey element of RST messages as well as the wst:RenewTarget element found in RST messages.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref>对象用于解析在 RST 消息的 wst︰ 元素，以及在 RST 消息中找到的 wst: renewtarget 元素中找到的令牌引用的安全。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> object.
